DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Double-blind Controlled Study Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Treatment Cognitive Impairment Such Working Memory Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: 1）patients diaginsed accord DSMIV paranoid schizophrenia；2）20～49 year old；3）Duration 2 ~ 10 year ; 4）the disease situation stable， fluctuation PANSS total score ≤10 % last 1 month , accept current drug 8 week ; 5）Patients , family doctor agree disease situation stable maintainthe current drug treatmentdrug next month；6）Signed informed consent 1 ) patient diaginsed accord DSMIV substance abuse , development delay ; 2 ) suffer serious physical disease accept treatment ; 3 ) rTMS contraindication : intracranial metal substance , heart pacemaker cochlear implant , intracranial pressure ; 4 ) disease situation stable， fluctuation PANSS total score > 10 % last 1 month , PANSS total score > 60 ; 5 ) difficult maintain current drug treatment least 1 month ; 6）undergoing ECT MECT last 3 month .
